author: Turpy
body:
# Summary of the new feature/enhancement

It would be nice to have a console drop down key (or combo), where the shell would slide down from the top of the screen. Refer to Linux based terminal emulators such as Tilda for an example.

comments.author: mklement0
HumanEquivalentUnit
comments.body: [ConEmu](https://conemu.github.io/) is a terminal which can do this on Windows.

comments.author: SRGOM
comments.body: Please create this issue in https://github.com/Microsoft/Console. I'd love to see this too.

comments.author: Turpy
comments.body: Thank you all for your replies. It looks like there is already a suggestion for this feature and it is in the backlog for the console. You can view it and vote for it here: https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/266908-command-prompt-console-windows-subsystem-for-l/suggestions/6510797-global-hotkey-to-activate-deactivate-running-conso
